title: Net Exports of Goods and Services for United States
notes: These Data Are Quarterly Totals At Annual Rates. Unadjusted Quarterly Figures Were Multiplied By Four To Derive Totals At Annual Rates. The Series Is Considered Comparable Throughout, Since Such Government Payments Were Neglible Prior To 1947. Data Are Now Called "Net Exports Of Goods And Services" In Source.
